directions: Rinse and pick through beans and place in a medium saucepan with water to cover by 2 inches.  Bring to a boil for 10 minutes, then remove from heat, cover and let soak 2 hours.  Drain and rinse.

In a 5 quart slow cooker, combine beans, stew meat, broth, wine, tomatoes, carrots, celery, potatoes, garlic and onions.  Season with salt, pepper, cayenne, red pepper flakes, oregano, mustard and hot sauce.  Cover and cook on low 10 to 12 hours.
ingredients: 4 large carrots, cut into 2 inch pieces
3 stalks celery, cut into 2 inch pieces
title: Spicy Chunks of Stewed Beef Soup
